name.ja: ジョインテック・レオ

requirement.en: During the turn you Normal Summoned this card.

effect.en: Choose 1 Spell/Trap Card in your opponent's Graveyard. Your opponent Sets that card on their field. Then, you can add 1 Level 7 or higher EARTH Attribute Machine Type monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

ja.set_name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Rush Duel Duel Disk Yudias Version
